testsuite.test:
Instructions
Instructions: This series of tests checks whether physical lengths are displayed correctly on the device.
You will need a ruler to measure objects on the screen.
For each test, please check whether the size of the box displayed matches the expected result.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Millimeters
Instructions: This test displays a box with width set to 3cm.
Please measure the width with the ruler.
Expected behaviour: Is the width of the box exactly 3 cm? (1 cm = 0.3937 in)

Inches
Instructions: This test displays a box with width set to 1in.
Please measure the width with the ruler.
Expected behaviour: Is the width of the box exactly 1 inch? (1 in = 2.54 cm)

Font in code mm code width in code em code
Instructions: This test displays a box with width:10 em; font-size: 3mm;.
Please measure the width with the ruler.
Expected behaviour: Is the width of the box exactly 3 cm? (1 cm = 0.3937 in)

Font in code in code width in code em code
Instructions: This test displays a box with width:10 em; font-size: 0.1in;.
Please measure the width with the ruler.
Expected behaviour: Is the width of the box exactly 1 inch? (1 in = 2.54 cm)

Font in code mm code CSS shorthand syntax width in code em code
Instructions: This test displays a box with width: 10em; font: 3mm/1.5 sans-serif; to test the font shorthand syntax.
Please measure the width with the ruler.
Expected behaviour: Is the width of the box exactly 3 cm? (1 cm = 0.3937 in)
